heroPerk.name: Sub Wafers
heroPerk.description: Harvesting <ModifiedAttribute>Metal </> objects has a <Number>32.00%</> chance to give <ModifiedAttribute>Sub Wafers</>. Consuming <ModifiedAttribute>Sub Wafers</> grants <ModifiedAttribute>Rockin' Riff</> (Increases <ModifiedAttribute>Damage</> by <Number>50.00%</> and <ModifiedAttribute>Melee Attack Speed</> by <Number>32.00%</>, decaying over 8 seconds).

commanderPerk.name: Sub Wafers +
commanderPerk.description: Harvesting <ModifiedAttribute>Metal </> objects has a <Number>100.00%</> chance to give <ModifiedAttribute>Sub Wafers</>. Consuming <ModifiedAttribute>Sub Wafers</> grants <ModifiedAttribute>Rockin' Riff</> (Increases <ModifiedAttribute>Damage</> by <Number>50.00%</> and <ModifiedAttribute>Melee Attack Speed</> by <Number>32.00%</>, decaying over 8 seconds).

abilities.name: T.E.D.D.Y.
abilities.description: Deploy a husk-crushing robot bear which deals [Damage] base damage per shot and fires [Ability.RateOfFire] shots per second. T.E.D.D.Y. lasts [Ability.Duration] seconds.

abilities.name: Shock Tower
abilities.description: Deploy a device which shocks nearby enemies, stunning them and dealing [Damage] base damage.

abilities.name: Seismic Smash
abilities.description: Smash the ground, creating a fissure of energy which deals [Damage.Value] energy damage to enemies.
